I would ask them about their role in the ecosystem and how they help maintain the balance of nature.
I would ask them about their favorite types of soil, light, and water conditions, as these factors can greatly affect their growth and health.
I would ask them about their social structures and how they communicate with each other.
I would ask them about their natural predators and how they protect themselves from threats.
I would ask them about their relationship with other living organisms, such as insects and other plants.
